feed.title: Kailash Hambarde
feed.subtitle: I am a researcher in computer vision and AI at Instituto de Telecomunicações [IT](https://www.it.pt/). I was previously a post-doctoral researcher at University of Beira Interior [UBI] (https://www.ubi.pt/en/), senior data scientist at [calanceus](https://www.calanceus.com/), data scientist at [ndsinfo](https://www.ndsinfo.com/) and Ph.D scholar at Swami Ramanand Teerth Marathwada University (https://srtmun.ac.in/en/). I received my Ph.D from the [SRTM University](https://srtmun.ac.in/en/) in 2020.
